channel.title: Hehe need still help (new questions)
channel.description:
1. how to spawn a npc that it will stay there i spawned it forever. (when i kill it it wont appear again)
2. how to add ::command scrolls like one for free players one for mods,admin,owner.
3. i can use the ::npc0 and hans appear but how do i remove Hans. he isnt on the spawn list.
4. how to add customs. and can somone give a tut for it and codes for all whips, owner armour admin and mod, all the santa hats like rune and blue, all p hats, all gs, including fire gs, lava gs, purple gs,blue, green, yellow, black gs, red, white, pimpz, owner gs,admin gs and mod gs.
5. how to remove the npc text.
6. how do i make a npc hit so much i want and have so much hp i want?
7. how to add commands like this ---> ::hail NAME, ::yelladmin = yellow crown) ADMIN NAME SAYS) hello
8. how to add drop commands like ::dropguthix, dropbarrows, droppartyhat, dropmod and like that
9. how to make a ::bank command?
10. how to make custom shops only for owners?
11. what is the best source, base u can get?
thx for reading and remeber if u can answer just: ANSWER
giving away 2 admins and 2 mods when games online and finished.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2009, 12:23:29 am[/size][hr]and one more question
13. (i think its number 13) when i die i end up in a room with 0 hp when i tele out i just being teled back so it ends up i must delete account. how to add like i end up in edgeville when i die with full hp?

item.title: Hehe need still help (new questions)
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hehe thx for the wonderful help i just got home from school but where to add theese things when i add’em it just is error[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2009, 08:15:27 am[/size][hr]good work but…
how to add shops with items?
my customs. i got some customs but how to add like they hit up in 50
they are (NOT AN EXISTING ITEM ITEM ID: *****) and it hits like 0-1 per hit
how to get it hit like 50[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2009, 09:39:35 am[/size][hr]can somone make me some customs? like owner full armour and admin and mod armour. blue gs and red, green, purple, black, white and yellow.
and some whips like dragon whip and all the rune, addy mithril bronze iron black. and green whip red, blue, and all whips and different customs.

or where / in wich folder can i find custom items

item.title: Hehe need still help (new questions)
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Ok im just going to hit a few because i’m going to bed…
Completly out of order…

Bank command

} // else if (command.startsWith("bank")) // if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) // { // sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); // } // else // { // openUpBank(); // }

Getting rid of hans after you spawned using ::npc 0, just close run.bat, and start server up again. It deletes any npc’s that you did not spawn through autospawn.cfg.

How to remove npc text… Its under npchandler.java, search what words they say, find the code, and delete.

how to add drop commands

} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dp")&& playerRights >= 3){ ItemHandler.addItem(1038, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1040, absX+1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1042, absX-1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1044, absX+1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1046, absX-1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1048, absX+1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1057, absX-1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1050, absX, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1055, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1053, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); }
Basically change the “dp” part to dropbarrows or what ever. Then the numbers like 1040, and so on. Replace with the item ids of the items you wish to have dropped. Also if you want all players to be able to do this change player rights from 3 to >0

making custom shops for owners.
make your shop, and place it in your staff section. For example:

[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”) && playerRights >= 1) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by ****
} else {
teleportToX = 2752;
teleportToY = 3508;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

            sendMessage("Staff area!");
            sendMessage("Shops are for mod+!");

}[/code]

This makes it so only staff personal may enter this area, then using autospawn.cfg spawn the shop you wish to have within your “staff area”.

::commands…

This is also an example.

[code][ public void SlayerHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@COMMANDS", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@PLAYER COMMANDS", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::fish / ::pots / ::rc@dbl@", 8146);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::smith / ::cook@dbl@", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::jad / ::afk / ::slayer@dbl@", 8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::edge / ::suggest (suggestion here)@dbl@",
            8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::shops / ::shops2@dbl@", 8150);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::wc / ::switch@dbl@", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pk2 / ::skillcapes / ::skillcapest / ::skillhoods@dbl@", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::drags and ::drags2@dbl@", 8153);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::starter only once!@dbl@", 8154);
    sendQuest("@dbl@MODERATOR COMMANDS@dbl@", 8155);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::jail / ::unjail . ::membership (username)@dbl@", 8156);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::modring ( if u use at pking its ban )@dbl@", 8157);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::notedbarrows, no giving away! / ::burst", 8158); 								
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::modset, ::barrage, ::tb,@dbl@", 8159);
    sendQuest("@dbl@ADMIN COMMANDS@dbl@", 8160);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pickup / ::master@dbl@",8161);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::rspk@dbl@", 8162);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pkarm@dbl@", 8163);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::banuser, ::jail and ::unjail@dbl@", 8164);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::npc (npcid)@dbl@", 8166);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pnpc (npc id) Dont abuse!@dbl@", 8167);
    sendQuest("@dbl@OWNER COMMANDS@dbl@", 8168);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::giveadmin and ::givemod@dbl@", 8169);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::ipban and ::kick / ::eat@dbl@", 8170);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ ::demote / ::staff@dbl@", 8171);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::range2dds and ::purepker@dbl@", 8172);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::deban / ::best / ::rares / ::xteleall@dbl@", 8173);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::adminrange, ::obbymauler, ::gspking@dbl@", 8174);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::richpk, ::dharokpk, ::richgs, ::fightpitsset@dbl@", 8175);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::vengeance, ::mager, ::ownerrunes@dbl@", 8176);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::goodstuff  / dp, dp2-8@dbl@", 8177);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
	
}/code]

[/code]

P.S. Even if this did not help you, a simple thanks would be app. since i spent time trying to help you. Hope that i helped, and that you are gracious for the people who actually care about the community.
-Sexy Slay

Read full topic
